title: ZkStateReader.getReplicaProps has an unused coreName parameter
description: The coreName parameter to ZkStateReader.getReplicaProps is un-used. We should audit its usages and remove it.

comments.author: ASF subversion and git services
comments.content:
Commit 1610033 from shalin@apache.org in branch 'dev/trunk'
[ https://svn.apache.org/r1610033 ]

SOLR-6240: Removed unused coreName parameter in ZkStateReader.getReplicaProps
